attributes.action: Defend the right of Christian Unions to control who may come into leadership of them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just as one would not expect a left wing political party to welcome people of a right wing persuasion into their leadership a Christian Union should be able to expect leaders to share the declared beliefs of that C.U. and that the C.U. has the right to control who may be admitted into leadership; this right should not exclude C.U.'s access to premises in Universities, colleges, schools etc. on a par with other societies in those establishments.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Defend the right of Christian Unions to control who may come into leadership of them."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13184.asp

Prime Minister's Office
